ra.context: ...The great god Ra rises in the eastern horizon, bringing light to the Two Lands...
ra.full_verse: The great god Ra rises in the eastern horizon, bringing light to the Two Lands. All creation rejoices at his coming.
ra.translation: Der große Gott Ra erhebt sich am östlichen Horizont und bringt Licht in die beiden Länder.

re.context: ...The great god Ra rises in the eastern horizon, bringing light to the Two Lands...
re.full_verse: The great god Ra rises in the eastern horizon, bringing light to the Two Lands. All creation rejoices at his coming.
re.translation: Der große Gott Ra erhebt sich am östlichen Horizont und bringt Licht in die beiden Länder.

osiris.context: ...An offering which the king gives to Osiris, Lord of Djedu, the Great God, Lord of Abydos...
osiris.full_verse: An offering which the king gives to Osiris, Lord of Djedu, the Great God, Lord of Abydos, that he may give invocation offerings of bread and beer.
osiris.translation: Ein Opfer, das der König dem Osiris gibt, dem Herrn von Djedu, dem großen Gott, dem Herrn von Abydos.

osiris.context: ...Osiris [Name] arises, the King of Eternity, Lord of Everlasting. Osiris has overthrown his enemies...
osiris.full_verse: Osiris [Name] arises, the King of Eternity, Lord of Everlasting. Osiris has overthrown his enemies. Osiris is triumphant.
osiris.translation: Osiris [Name] erhebt sich, der König der Ewigkeit, Herr der Unvergänglichkeit.

isis.context: ...Isis comes to thee, rejoicing in love of thee. Thy seed is in her body...
isis.full_verse: Isis comes to thee, rejoicing in love of thee. Thy seed is in her body, so that she may protect thee, Osiris.
isis.translation: Isis kommt zu dir, freudig in der Liebe zu dir. Dein Same ist in ihrem Körper.

horus.text_name: The Contendings of Horus and Seth
horus.context: ...Then Horus said before the Ennead: Give me my office, for I am the son of Osiris...
horus.full_verse: Then Horus said before the Ennead: Give me my office, for I am the son of Osiris. I am Horus, the avenger of his father.
horus.translation: Dann sprach Horus vor der Neunheit: Gebt mir mein Amt, denn ich bin der Sohn des Osiris.

anubis.context: ...Anubis, who is upon his mountain, who is in the place of embalming, has extended his arms over thee...
anubis.full_verse: Anubis, who is upon his mountain, who is in the place of embalming, has extended his arms over thee. He has given thee thy head, he has assembled thy bones for thee.
anubis.translation: Anubis, der auf seinem Berg ist, der an der Stätte der Einbalsamierung ist, hat seine Arme über dich ausgestreckt.

thoth.context: ...Thoth, lord of divine words, who judges the Two Combatants, who calms the gods...
thoth.full_verse: Thoth, lord of divine words, who judges the Two Combatants, who calms the gods when they are wrathful. Scribe of the Ennead, who records the truth.
thoth.translation: Thoth, Herr der göttlichen Worte, der die zwei Kämpfer richtet, der die Götter beruhigt.

maat.context: ...Follow Maat, for it is excellent. Maat is great and its effectiveness endures...
maat.full_verse: Follow Maat, for it is excellent. Maat is great and its effectiveness endures. It has not been disturbed since the time of its creator.
maat.translation: Folge der Maat, denn sie ist ausgezeichnet. Maat ist groß und ihre Wirksamkeit dauert an.

duat.context: ...He enters the Duat, the hidden place where Ra rests. The gates open before him...
duat.full_verse: He enters the Duat, the hidden place where Ra rests. The gates open before him, and the guardians cry out in praise.
duat.translation: Er betritt die Duat, den verborgenen Ort, wo Ra ruht. Die Tore öffnen sich vor ihm.

ankh.context: ...May he be given life (ankh), prosperity (wꜢs), and health (ḏd) like Ra forever...
ankh.full_verse: May he be given life (ankh), prosperity (wꜢs), and health (ḏd) like Ra forever and ever.
ankh.translation: Möge ihm gegeben werden Leben (ankh), Wohlstand (was) und Gesundheit (djed) wie Ra für immer.

neith.context: ...Neith, the great mother, who gave birth to Ra when nothing else existed...
neith.full_verse: Neith, the great mother, who gave birth to Ra when nothing else existed. She is the cow who gave birth to the sun.
neith.translation: Neith, die große Mutter, die Ra gebar, als nichts anderes existierte.
